Sentencas: Long-term stability tests are performed at 800 degrees C on Pr2NiO4+delta air electrodes by use of a symmetrical button cell with Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 as solid electrolyte.
Titulo: Long-Term Stability of Pr2NiO4+δ Air Electrodes for Solid Oxide Cells against Chromium Poisoning

Sentencas: The experiments are carried out by means of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy and current-voltage measurements with and without current load under dry and humid conditions in the presence of a chromium source.
Titulo: Long-Term Stability of Pr2NiO4+δ Air Electrodes for Solid Oxide Cells against Chromium Poisoning

Sentencas: Chromium poisoning of Pr2NiO4+delta air electrodes is investigated for periods of several hundred hours at 30% relative humidity.
Titulo: Long-Term Stability of Pr2NiO4+δ Air Electrodes for Solid Oxide Cells against Chromium Poisoning

Sentencas: In order to separate the influence of anodic and cathodic electrode polarization on Cr-deposition, measurements are conducted using a Pt-reference electrode.
Titulo: Long-Term Stability of Pr2NiO4+δ Air Electrodes for Solid Oxide Cells against Chromium Poisoning

Sentencas: The electrode performance is found to remain fairly stable under dry conditions, even when a current is drawn.
Titulo: Long-Term Stability of Pr2NiO4+δ Air Electrodes for Solid Oxide Cells against Chromium Poisoning

Sentencas: However, after volatile Cr-species in a humid atmosphere are introduced, the cell performance starts to deteriorate and the polarization resistance contribution of the SOFC cathode increases significantly.
Titulo: Long-Term Stability of Pr2NiO4+δ Air Electrodes for Solid Oxide Cells against Chromium Poisoning

Sentencas: After several thousand hours, the electrodes are analyzed by means of analytical electron microscopy.
Titulo: Long-Term Stability of Pr2NiO4+δ Air Electrodes for Solid Oxide Cells against Chromium Poisoning

Sentencas: Detailed post-test analyses provide evidence for a correlation between the extent of Cr-deposition and electrode degradation in SOFC as well as SOEC mode.
Titulo: Long-Term Stability of Pr2NiO4+δ Air Electrodes for Solid Oxide Cells against Chromium Poisoning

Sentencas: Based on these findings, enhanced resilience of Pr2NiO4+delta against Cr-poisoning in SOEC mode can be established.
Titulo: Long-Term Stability of Pr2NiO4+δ Air Electrodes for Solid Oxide Cells against Chromium Poisoning
Long-Term Stability of Pr2NiO4+δ Air Electrodes for Solid Oxide Cells against Chromium Poisoning

Titulo: Long-Term Stability of Pr2NiO4+δ Air Electrodes for Solid Oxide Cells against Chromium Poisoning
